FuncDef: The rmdir command deletes a specified directory from the remote machine.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of the destination directory.
The value is a string of 1 to 255 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
By executing the rmdir command deletes an unused or deserted directory.
Precautions
A directory to be deleted must be empty, otherwise, it cannot be deleted.
You can use this command to delete the specified directory from FTP server and not from FTP client.
